ModMetaData.name: Real-Time Auto Save
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to configure auto-saves to happen on a real-time interval rather than an in-game time interval (default is 10 minutes). That way if you're working on some complex planning while the game is paused, it will still be saved every so often in case you get a BSOD or something (Windows 10 amiright?)
Tested with versions 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, and 1.5. Use at your own risk!! I am not responsible if your auto-saves aren't working and your game crashes and you lose hours of progress.
